Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, helpful staff, central location”
Reviews.Author: langtounhobbit
Reviews.Content: stayed family couple nights april 2010 becoming stranded york due disruption caused volcanic eruptions iceland clean wellpresented hotel helpful staff decent sized double beds bathroom fine complimentary breakfast reasonable albeit bit busy scramble possibly hotel busy stranded travellers running short money staff job trying breakfast supplies topped circumstances central location easy walking distance midtown sites eg empire rockerfeller centre times square macys etc offer reasonable rates outwith unexpected peak demand experienced overall happily recommend basic hotel short break nyc
